entries.title: Track Your Habits
entries.description: Tracking your habits to help deliver the best accuracy for recommendations.

entries.title: Favorite Recipes
entries.description: Mark the best recipes as your favorites to make them much easier to find.

entries.title: Login Daily
entries.description: Make sure to login and post stats daily to keep track of eating and workout trends.

entries.title: Set Your Baseline
entries.description: In your profile tab, you can set your baseline habits to compare your current trends with.

entries.title: Try New Recipes
entries.description: There are many recipes to try, make sure you use the search feature to find new ones.

entries.title: The Home Tab
entries.description: The home tab is a great place to find new recipes since its based off of eating trends.

entries.title: The Trends Tab
entries.description: The trends tab is a great place to view your eating trends at a glance.

entries.title: Healthy Meals
entries.description: Healthy meals have the 'Healthy' keyword before the title.

entries.title: Viewing Recipes
entries.description: You can click to expand recipes to view the ingredients and instructions.
